survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee experiences and preferences regarding returning to the office after remote work during the pandemic.

questions.question_text: How often are you currently working from the office?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: How often are you currently working from the office?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to return to the office (or remain remote)?
answer_options: Home environment not conducive to work
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied motivations.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to return to the office (or remain remote)?
answer_options: Home environment not conducive to work

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work arrangement (office/remote/hybrid)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work arrangement (office/remote/hybrid)?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more comfortable returning to the office?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Hybrid' or 'Full-time' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to address diverse concerns.
